sentences.sContent: What is the process of colonization?
sentences.sCn: 殖民地化的过程又是怎样？

sentences.sContent: They have known colonization, revolution and emigration.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have known colonization, revolution and emigration.
sentences.sCn: 他们了解殖民、革命还有移民。

sentences.sContent: We also substituted “settlement” for “colonization” in the title of the book.
sentences.sContent_eng: We also substituted “settlement” for “colonization” in the title of the book.
sentences.sCn: 本书标题中原先使用的“殖民”一词，也用“移民”代替。

remMethod.val: 来自colonize(v. 殖民化， 殖民地化)
